trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> representing the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che rappresenta il rettangolo di delimitazione dell’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the screen coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.
trans-unit.target: L’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che rappresenta le coordinate di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the word "Window".
Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'etichetta di testo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the name is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> o <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> oppure <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> se il nome è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà nome può essere considerata come stringa di testo che si utilizzerebbe per spiegare il controllo viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: È importante disporre di una rappresentazione testuale per tutti i controlli di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] in modo che è possibile fare riferimento al controllo è a livello di codice in modo localizzato.
